description: Fetches the schema version difference in the specified difference type between two stored schema versions in the Schema Registry. This API allows you to compare two schema versions between two schema definitions under the same schema.

parameters.name: SchemaId
parameters.description: This is a wrapper structure to contain schema identity fields. The structure contains: SchemaId$SchemaArn: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the schema. One of SchemaArn or SchemaName has to be provided. SchemaId$SchemaName: The name of the schema. SchemaArn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the schema. SchemaName (string) --- The name of the schema. RegistryName (string) --- The name of the schema registry that contains the schema.

parameters.name: FirstSchemaVersionNumber
parameters.description: The first of the two schema versions to be compared. LatestVersion (boolean) --- The latest version available for the schema. VersionNumber (integer) --- The version number of the schema.

nested_params.name: LatestVersion
nested_params.description: The latest version available for the schema.

nested_params.name: VersionNumber
nested_params.description: The version number of the schema.

parameters.name: SecondSchemaVersionNumber
parameters.description: The second of the two schema versions to be compared. LatestVersion (boolean) --- The latest version available for the schema. VersionNumber (integer) --- The version number of the schema.

nested_params.name: LatestVersion
nested_params.description: The latest version available for the schema.

nested_params.name: VersionNumber
nested_params.description: The version number of the schema.

parameters.name: SchemaDiffType
parameters.description: Refers to SYNTAX_DIFF, which is the currently supported diff type.

nested_items.name: Diff
nested_items.description: The difference between schemas as a string in JsonPatch format.
